Class BattleContext

java.lang.Object
BattleContext
public class BattleContext extends Object
The current battle context in which a BattleModifier is being employed. The context includes the current round, the champion that is the wielder of the modifier, the enemy champion, and the battle log.

  • Field Summary

    Check if a champion is the enemy of the wielder.
    BattleContext
    reverse()
    Get a BattleContext with the roles of the champions reversed, ie for the second champion to be the wielder and the first champion to be the enemy.

  • Method Details

    • isAttacker

      public boolean isAttacker(Champion champ)
      Check if a champion is the wielder of the modifier.
      Parameters:
      champ - The champion to check
      Returns:
      true if the champion is the attacker weilding the modifier.

    • isDefending

      public boolean isDefending(Champion champ)
      Check if a champion is the enemy of the wielder.
      Parameters:
      champ - The champion to check
      Returns:
      true if the champion is the defender weilding the wielder.

    • getLog

      public BattleLog getLog()
      Get the battle log to record actions and events.
      Returns:
      the battle log for the current battle context

    • reverse

      public BattleContext reverse()
      Get a BattleContext with the roles of the champions reversed, ie for the second champion to be the wielder and the first champion to be the enemy.
      Returns:
      a new BattleContext with the roles of the champions reversed
